mapper.sql: WITH writer_reports AS (SELECT GROUP_SUBMITTER_ID_FK, GROUP_TITLE FROM group_drive_report_tb WHERE GROUP_DRIVER_ID_FK = ${groupDriverIdFk} ORDER BY GROUP_DRIVE_REPORT_ID DESC LIMIT 50 )
mapper.select: SELECT COMPANY FROM submitter_tb WHERE SUBMITTER_ID IN (SELECT GROUP_SUBMITTER_ID_FK FROM writer_reports) GROUP BY COMPANY LIMIT 10
SELECT GROUP_TITLE FROM writer_reports GROUP BY GROUP_TITLE HAVING GROUP_TITLE != '' LIMIT 10
mapper.sql: WITH join_reports AS (SELECT * FROM drive_report_tb INNER JOIN submitter_tb on drive_report_tb.SUBMITTER_ID_FK = submitter_tb.SUBMITTER_ID WHERE DRIVER_ID_FK = ${driverIdFk} ORDER BY DRIVE_REPORT_ID DESC )
